short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It makes it easy to shorten annoying Amazon item URL by clicking extension icon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon URL is often longer because URL encoding and many query parameter.
If you manage amazon links, It is annoying.
This extension shorten them by just clicking this extension icon.
